subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Drew Kittleson, a 20-year-old amateur, has dreamed of playing in the United States Open for years. The reality at Bethpage Black was rain-shortened and bittersweet.
snippet: Drew Kittleson, a 20-year-old amateur, has dreamed of playing in the United States Open for years. The reality at Bethpage Black was rain-shortened and bittersweet.
